articles.author: Compiled by Janine Van der Post
articles.title: Collectors, get ready: 115 Exclusive classic cars to go on sale at multi-million-dollar SA auction - News24
articles.description: Car collectors are gearing up for an exclusive classic car sale that will see Italian designed vehicles, German, European, and American Muscle cars go under the hammer at an exceptional auction in July..
articles.content: • Creative Rides will host a 115-Lot exclusive classic car auction in July.  • The international event will be live streamed. • 30 Italian designed vehicles, along with more than 30 American muscle c… [+4056 chars]
